permissions: User must be present (authenticated) to create a user search (UserSearchPolicy#create?).
side_effects: Performs a user lookup by contact method/value and returns a matching user when found.
validation_notes: --contact-method is required and must be email_address or mobile_number. --contact-value is required. When contact-method is mobile_number, the server validates contact-value as a phone number.

flags.name: --contact-value
flags.validation: Required; if contact-method is mobile_number, server validates phone number format.

flags.name: --only-admin-or-member
flags.description: Restrict matches to admins or members (true/false)
flags.validation: Expected true or false when provided.
